have to agree,it's gettin a bit soap series type with all the lovey dovey stuff,get back to the whole point of the show,still love it though but bit more action next series,someone said 4 more seasons how thwe hell are they gonna drag it out that long,get like 24/lost and everyone will just switch off and get bored...
